summary: Follower Pack including the Hot Files of Laima, Morwen, Mvpberserker's Elise, and Yourskyrim123's Mystique.  Combined into one .esp for convenience.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#1e84cc][size=6]mfeile1974's Hot Files Follower Pack[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Verdana]
[size=2]Featuring[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77639/?]Laima[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78187/?]Morwen[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78488/?]Mvpberserker's Elise[/url], and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77839/?]Yourskyrim123's Mystique[/url][/size]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/auss8snwn/20160913235516_1.jpg[/img]

[/font][font=Verdana][size=2][i]*The four followers merged into one .esp for convenience*
[/i]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
Name:  [u]Laima[/u]
Race:  Redguard
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  .92
Weight:  80
Body:  Custom UUNP & CBBE
Skin:  Fair Skin
Location:  Dragonsbridge - Four Shields Tavern

Armor:  UUNP - 1001 Night
Armor:  CBBE - Merta Assassin

Weapons:  UUNP - Engraved Shamshir & Bow with Redguard Shield
Weapons:  CBBE - Vanilla Ebony

Skill Bonuses to Sneak, Block, & One Handed.  Default Combat Style.  Only spell is Healing.  Redguard traits/bonuses.
-----
Name:  [u]Morwen[/u]
Race:  Nord
Voice:  Female Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1
Weight:  100
Body:  UNP & CBBE
Skin:  Fair Skin
Location:  Winterhold - Frozen Hearth

Armor:  Nordic Carved Bikini Armor
Weapons:  Northern Spirit - Nordic Arsenal

Combat Assassin, Boss 1-Handed.  Nord Traits/bonuses.
-----
Name:  [u]Elise[/u]
Race:  Nord based
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1
Weight:  28
Body:  UNPB & CBBE
Skin:  Fair Skin
Location:  Solitude - Winking Skeever

Armor:  Demon Hunter
Weapon:  Sword of the Ancient Tongues

Two Handed Perks.  Bonuses to Two Handed, Sneak, Light Armor
-----
Name:  [u]Mystique[/u]
Race:  Nord based
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Weight:  100
Body:  UNPB & CBBE
Skin:  Born Dragon
Location:  Morthal - Moorside Inn

Armor:  Thalmore Viceroy Inquisitors Clothes[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28926/?]
[/url]Weapon:  None - Unarmed

Bonuses to Sneak, Block, and all Magic
-----
There are two packs.  CBBE & UNP Family
All Level With Player.
ENB:  RealVision & Vividian
Tested with AFT & EFF

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/qitzfl3if/20160914075508_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/p0jq1tk3r/Requirements.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]HDT Compatible Skeleton (XPMSE)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT High Heels[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x4ru6k6iv/Recommended.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/571605/?tb=mods&pUp=1]aMidianBorn Texture Replacers[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/qn8xn1w5j/KnownIssues.png[/img]
All four together can be hard on certain computers so please be aware of your computer's limits when using.

Laima UNP Family:  Feet sink through ground at times.  This is due to no HDT High Heel.

Elise:  Some users had issues with hair clipping through helmets, hoods, etc.

Mystique UNP Family:  On UNP version there is blue line in ankle area.  This is in the skin texture itself.

*If You Have The Individual Followers Installed, I Highly Recommend Removing Before Installing Pack*

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/fz56o7m6f/Installation.png[/img]
Manual or Your Favorite Mod Manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x7bptea6f/Uninstall.png[/img]
Manual Removal or Your Favorite Mod Manager
